channel.title: Comments on: New Order’s disorder continues

item.title: By: Joy Division reissue campaign to coincide with release of Control

item.description: [...] the members of New Order continue to fight, Joy Division reissue plans are full steam ahead to cash in on celebrate the release of Control, [...]
